sentences.en: After swimming, I find that I have a voracious appetite.
sentences.cn: 游完泳后, 我发现我的食欲大增.

sentences.en: All otters have a voracious appetite.
sentences.cn: 所有的水獭都有一个贪吃的胃口。

sentences.en: Diana was astute enough to understand the power of television and the voracious British tabloid newspapers.
sentences.cn: 黛安娜的智慧了解到电视和贪婪的英国狗仔小报所带来的影响力.

sentences.en: Her appetite for information was voracious.
sentences.cn: 她对信息有强烈的渴求。

sentences.en: Jianguo was also a voracious reader and a brilliant Go player.
sentences.cn: 建国不仅阅读量极大,并且是一名出色的围棋手.

sentences.en: John would not be overweight if he were not such a voracious eater.
sentences.cn: 约翰如果不这么贪吃的话,就不会超重了.

sentences.en: Joseph Smith was a voracious book collector.
sentences.cn: 约瑟夫·史密斯是个如饥似渴的藏书家。

sentences.en: She's a voracious reader of all kinds of love stories.
sentences.cn: 什么样的爱情故事她都百看不厌.

sentences.en: The British are the most voracious newspaper readers in the world.
sentences.cn: 英国人是世界上最贪婪的新闻读者们.

sentences.en: The giant star - forming galaxies and voracious black holes of the universe's past are now moribund.
sentences.cn: 过去在宇宙中形成恒星的巨大星系与狼吞虎咽的黑洞,现在都处于停滞状态.

sentences.en: These voracious predators consume some 500 pounds of food each day.
sentences.cn: 这些食欲旺盛的肉食动物每天要消耗大约五百磅的食物.

sentences.en: They must take a break from their voracious consumption.
sentences.cn: 他们那种贪婪的消费必须止步了.

sentences.en: TODAY'S business leaders are voracious consumers of management advice.
sentences.cn: 今天的商业领导如饥似渴地寻求管理忠告.

sentences.en: Tom is often voracious, one day he ate as much as three pounds of meat.
sentences.cn: 汤姆经常是狼吞虎咽的, 一天他吃了三磅肉.

words.tran_cn: 狼吞虎咽地；贪得无厌地

trans.tran_cn: 贪吃的，贪婪的，渴求的，如饥似渴的
trans.tran_en: eating or wanting large quantities of food
